Package server

Class Communication

java.lang.Object
server.Communication
public class Communication extends Object
Facilitates communication over the network with strings and maps.

  • Method Details

    • cmdColor

      public static Map<String,String> cmdColor(Piece.Color color)
      Generates the payload for a color assignment command. A null value is returned if the argument if null, otherwise a Map as described below is returned.

      This command is comprised of the following components:

      color Command Payload
      Key Commentary
      cmd Identifies this command, always color.
      color The color being assigned by this command. This value is the result of a .name() call to one of the parameters of the Piece.Color enum. The string includes any capitalization of the parameter, and is case sensative for deserialization.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to act as the value for the color entry.
      Returns:
      the payload for a color assignment command.

    • cmdMove

      public static Map<String,String> cmdMove(Move move)
      Generates the payload for a movement command. A null value is returned if the argument if null, otherwise a Map as described below is returned.

      This command is comprised of the following components:

      move Command Payload
      Key Commentary
      cmd Identifies this command, always move.
      start The start tile, in algebraic notation, of the move object. Algebraic notation consists of a two character string, where the first character is a lowercase letter on the interval [a, h] representing the column, and the second character is a number on the interval [1, 8] representing the row.
      end The end tile, in algebraic notation, of the move.
      flag The flag of the move. This value is a string literal resulting from the .name() call to the Move.Flag enum parameter contained by the move object. If the flag is none, the value "NONE" will still be used.
      Parameters:
      move - the move to act as the value for parameters in this command.
      Returns:
      the payload for a movement command.

    • cmdState

      public static Map<String,String> cmdState(BoardInfo info)
      Generates the payload for a board state command. A null value is returned if the argument if null, otherwise a Map as described below is returned.

      This command is comprised of the following components:

      state Command Payload
      Key Commentary
      cmd Identifies this command, always state.
      fen The fen string representing the argument object. This is derived using the FenUtility.fenFromInformation method.
      state The current state of the board as determined by the inferState method of the argument BoardInfo object. The value for this key is a string literal resulting from the call to the .name() method of the returned BoardInfo.State enum parameter.
      Parameters:
      info - the board information to act as the value for parameters in this command.
      Returns:
      the payload for a board state command.

    • serialize

      public static String serialize(Map<String,String> map)
      Serializes a Map to a String. The keys and values of the map are permitted to contain any character that can be successfully passed over a network socket. Commas, colons, and double-quotes are allowed and will be managed accordingly by the deserialize method.

      This method does not rely on the Map.toString method. The syntax of the returned string is as follows:

      • The string begins and ends with curly brackets
      • All keys and values, which must be strings, are enclosed within literal double-quotes
      • Any double-quotes already present in the keys and values are converted to the literal string '\"' (that is, the value \\\\\" is inserted to replace any \")
      • Keys are separated from values with a single colon, and without any whitespace
      • Map entries are separated with a single comma, and without any whitespace

      An example string for the map {key=value, ke"y=value}, when printed to the standard output, would be:

      '{"key":"value","ke\"y"="value"}'

      Parameters:
      map - the Map to serialize.
      Returns:
      the serialized string.
      See Also:
      • deserialize(java.lang.String)

    • deserialize

      public static Map<String,String> deserialize(String str)
      Deserializes a Map from a String.
      Parameters:
      str - the string to deserialize.
      Returns:
      the deserialized map.
      See Also:
      • serialize(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>)
